name: Zarathos
backStory: Born of infernal blood in the twilight shadows of the Darkened Veil, Zarathos was marked from birth by the dark gods. His early years were spent as a slave, enduring endless torment, until he discovered an ancient tome of forbidden magic. With each spell he mastered, his power grew, and he eventually broke free from his chains. Now, with a thirst for vengeance and an insatiable desire for dominion, Zarathos seeks to conquer the Darkened Veil and bend it to his will. His ultimate goal: to eclipse the light forever and reign supreme over the shadowed land.
